full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 43 of 247 171 LBUVMAX2 Visoski - direct 1 A. It was always closed. 2 Q. So were you able to observe the passengers on the flights you piloted on that plane? 3 4 A. No. 5 Q. What records did you keep as a pilot for Mr. Epstein? 6 A. We kept two documents, one was a flight log and the other was a passenger manifest. 7 8 Q. And when you say "we," who do you mean? 9 A. I meant myself and the other pilot. 10 Q. And who was that? 11 A. David Rogers. 12 Q. You mentioned a flight log and a passenger manifest. Did you complete one for each flight you piloted for Mr. Epstein? 13 14 A. Yes, I did. 15 Q. What is contained in a flight log? 16 A. A flight log is a document that is pretty much married to the aircraft; it's the history of how many hours the aircraft has on it, how many times the aircraft has landed, each engine has its own total time that's recorded, as well as how many times it was cycled, meaning turned on or off. 17 18 19 20 21 Q. Will that flight log have any information about the passengers onboard for a particular flight? 22 23 A. No, it will not. 24 Q. How about the passenger manifest, what information goes into a passenger manifest? 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011815

text_blocks.content: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 43 of 247 171 LBUVMAX2 Visoski - direct

1 A. It was always closed. 2 Q. So were you able to observe the passengers on the flights you piloted on that plane? 3 4 A. No. 5 Q. What records did you keep as a pilot for Mr. Epstein? 6 A. We kept two documents, one was a flight log and the other was a passenger manifest. 7 8 Q. And when you say "we," who do you mean? 9 A. I meant myself and the other pilot. 10 Q. And who was that? 11 A. David Rogers. 12 Q. You mentioned a flight log and a passenger manifest. Did you complete one for each flight you piloted for Mr. Epstein? 13 14 A. Yes, I did. 15 Q. What is contained in a flight log? 16 A. A flight log is a document that is pretty much married to the aircraft; it's the history of how many hours the aircraft has on it, how many times the aircraft has landed, each engine has its own total time that's recorded, as well as how many times it was cycled, meaning turned on or off. 17 18 19 20 21 Q. Will that flight log have any information about the passengers onboard for a particular flight? 22 23 A. No, it will not. 24 Q. How about the passenger manifest, what information goes into a passenger manifest? 25
